title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
### Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit

**Product Overview:**
Dive into the fascinating world of electromagnetism and energy conversion with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit. This comprehensive kit is designed to engage and educate children in the principles of electric motors and generators, making it an excellent addition to any STEM curriculum. Ideal for students in grades 3-6, this kit offers a hands-on learning experience that is both fun and educational.

**Key Features:**
- **Electric Motor with Transparent Plastic:** See the inner workings of the motor as it converts electricity into motion.
- **Battery-Powered Motor Operation:** Experiment with different voltages and observe how they affect motor performance.
- **Reconfigurable to Hand-Crank Electric Generator:** Transform the motor into a generator to understand how motion is converted into electricity.
- **Explore Magnetic Fields and Electric Currents:** Use magnets and the motor/generator to explore the relationship between magnetic fields and electric currents.

**Educational Benefits:**
- **25 Guided Experiments:** A 48-page color student guide provides step-by-step instructions for experiments that cover a range of topics, including magnetism, circuits, and energy conversion.
- **Hands-On Learning:** Build simple circuits, experiment with magnets, and learn about gears and drive trains.
- **STEM Focus:** Enhance understanding of science, technology, engineering, and math through practical, real-world applications.

**Product Specifications:**
- **Grade Level:** 3-6
- **Age Range:** 8+
- **Awards:** Parents' Choice Silver Award
- **Manual:** 60-page full-color manual (2012)
- **Dimensions:** 13.1 inches (H) x 8.9 inches (W) x 2.6 inches (D)
- **Weight:** 1.3 pounds

**Learning Outcomes:**
- **Electric Motor Function:** Understand how an electric motor works and how it converts electrical energy into mechanical energy.
- **Electric Generator Function:** Learn how a generator converts mechanical energy into electrical energy.
- **Magnetic Fields and Electric Currents:** Gain a deeper understanding of the principles of magnetic fields and electric currents.
- **Energy Conversion:** Explore the conversion of kinetic energy to electrical energy and vice versa.

**Components:**
- **Motor Material:** Transparent plastic for clear visibility of internal components.
- **Configurations:** Battery-powered motor and hand-crank electric generator.

**Experiments:**
- **Magnetism:** Experiment with different magnets and their effects.
- **Circuits:** Build and test simple circuits.
- **Gears and Drive Trains:** Discover the mechanics of gears and how they transfer motion.

**Why Choose Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit?**
- **Award-Winning Quality:** Recognized for its educational value and engaging content.
- **Comprehensive Learning:** A well-rounded kit that covers multiple aspects of electromagnetism and energy conversion.
- **Engaging and Interactive:** Perfect for both school projects and home learning, making science accessible and fun.

**Customer Reviews:**
"An excellent kit that keeps my kids engaged for hours! The experiments are well thought out, and the manual is easy to follow. Highly recommend for any young scientist." – Sarah M.

"Great for teaching the basics of electricity and magnetism. My 9-year-old son loves it and has learned so much from the hands-on activities." – David T.

**Order Now and Ignite Your Child's Passion for Science!**

Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is the perfect tool to inspire the next generation of scientists and engineers. Order today and watch your child's curiosity and knowledge grow!
